title: NA server Unavailable
body: The server is unavailable to log in. There is no login queue, it is just unavailable in its entirety, Pls fix, I have no life and want to play my leagues.

replies.body:
Sorry about that, we dressed the login server up as Skaarl and it ran away until we were able to build up its courage to come back. :P

Servers are up now, so you can log in and get in on some Kled gameplay right away!
Look for a post titled "riot compensation for downed server" and spread the word
can you link me to it or tell me which forum?
somebody fix this I need this to be fixed please
Ye i got the same issue. I think its about they're fixing the long login q.
